TopicTitle: Can You Launch Two of the Same Rocket?

Articles.Content:
Hey, guys.

I have a ship already orbiting around Kerbin and I was wondering if I would be able to launch the rocket again so there would be two of the same rocket in space (same name, same everything) without it removing the other rocket?

Thanks in advance for your help.

Alright, first, Welcome to the forums!

Second, yes you can, you can launch 100000000000000 of the same rocket and it will still be there.

It depends on what version you have actually. Did you pay for the game? If so, YOu have version 0.15 or 0.15.2.

There should be a tracking station in the space center menu where you can resume a flight!
Yeah I have the full game, I just wanted to make sure I could have two of the same rockets in space.
